ðŸ†• Added / Enabled  
- Introduced Manus AI in Settings for smarter controls and suggestions.

- Enabled audience list in the Stories audience sheet (not functional yet).  
- Added custom color selection for the Add Yours sticker.  
- Enabled Material UIâ€“style toggle buttons across supported screens.  
- Enabled Superlike feature on Stories.

- Enabled self-remove option in Close Friends stories (not functional yet).  
- Enabled See Friendship option in profile menu for better context.

- Expanded Notes audience options (not functional yet).  
- Enabled pinch-to-zoom and improved interactions on Reels.  
- Enabled better Stories tray seen-state handling and refresh behavior.  
- Enabled improved sharing sheets with richer previews and smoother transitions.  

ðŸ”„ Updated / Improved

- Improved Reels audio dubbing behavior via updated flags.  
- Improved overall toggle responsiveness and UI consistency.  
- Updated Stories AI restyle and transition handling.  
- Updated background processing for faster feed and Reels loading.  

ðŸª„ Restored  
- Brought back the search bar in the Stories viewer list for easier discovery.  

ðŸ›  Fixed  
- Fixed Reels stretch issue affecting playback.  
- Fixed crashes while sharing Reels or post links to other apps.  
- Fixed missing emoji rendering issue.  
- Fixed random DM crashes.  
- Fixed Repost button not responding on Reels.  
- Fixed various stability issues across feed, Stories, and comments.  

ðŸ“Œ Misc
